channel.title: Killing Time
channel.description:
Each week join Haddie and Dan for Killing Time where they’ll be talking about everything you’d rather be reading, laughing, Googling, and looking at when you should be working, sleeping, or just paying attention.
Photo by Annie Ray. Hosted by Haddie Cooke & Dan Benjamin.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Killing Time
channel.itunes:author: 5by5
channel.itunes:summary:
Each week join Haddie and Dan for Killing Time where they’ll be talking about everything you’d rather be reading, laughing, Googling, and looking at when you should be working, sleeping, or just paying attention.
Photo by Annie Ray. Hosted by Haddie Cooke & Dan Benjamin.
channel.itunes:keywords: killing time, Dan Benjamin, Haddie Cooke, geek, movies, tv

item.title: 6: Poopie-Time Bacteria

item.description: Haddie and Dan talk about the brief water crisis in Austin, Halloween, voting, and give their weekly recommendations!

item.title: 4: Stab At Thee
item.author: Haddie Cooke & Dan Benjamin
item.description:
Haddie and Dan talk about shark bites, turmeric, Zelda Breath of the Wild, and recommend some great TV shows for those unsure what to watch next.
TV Show List in show notes!
item.content:encoded:
Haddie and Dan talk about shark bites, turmeric, Zelda Breath of the Wild, and recommend some great TV shows for those unsure what to watch next.

TV Show List in show notes!

Links for this episode:

  • Jeff Johnson on Instagram
    “Mike Spalding with a bite from a Cookiecutter Shark. This is believed to be the first documented bite on a living human by the bizarre…”

  • Macy's - Wikipedia
  • No Fear Shakespeare: Macbeth: Act 4, Scene 2, Page 5

item.title: 3: Planet of Raccoons
item.author: Haddie Cooke & Dan Benjamin
item.description:
Haddie and Dan discuss the Fermi Paradox, the possibility of life on other planets, animals that speak other languages, eggnog recipes, and when the appropriate time is to have a Thanksgiving meal.
Have a good Thanksgiving Supper/Dinner/Lunch/Tea/Midnight Snack!
item.content:encoded:
Haddie and Dan discuss the Fermi Paradox, the possibility of life on other planets, animals that speak other languages, eggnog recipes, and when the appropriate time is to have a Thanksgiving meal.

Have a good Thanksgiving Supper/Dinner/Lunch/Tea/Midnight Snack!

item.title: 2: Conurbation

item.description: Haddie and Dan talk about cropdusting (yes that kind), Instagram stories, speaking your truth, their recent trip to New York, the difference between a town and a city, and the rules of a 4-way stop.

item.title: 1: Broken Bones
item.author: Haddie Cooke & Dan Benjamin
item.description:
4,3,2,1...Haddie and Dan are back!
Welcome to the premier episode of Killing Time! We talk about music, movies, and where we think this show will go. Will we talk about the paranormal? Or what certain song lyrics mean? Possibly rant about something that's ruffled our feathers? Quite possibly none, some, or all of the above and so much more.
item.content:encoded:
4,3,2,1...Haddie and Dan are back!

Welcome to the premier episode of Killing Time! We talk about music, movies, and where we think this show will go. Will we talk about the paranormal? Or what certain song lyrics mean? Possibly rant about something that's ruffled our feathers? Quite possibly none, some, or all of the above and so much more.

Links for this episode:

  • Irish farmer's glorious accent is so strong even Irish people can't understand it
  • This Gorgeous Poster Contains Every Single Bird You'll See in North America

  • Turmeric, ginger infuse this latte with color, good-for-you flavor | Relish Austin
